templates.name: Wholesale inquiries
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! The best way to discuss wholesale is to give us a call at 1 (844) 327-6891. Our team is happy to chat.

templates.name: When will I receive my refund?
templates.content: We'll send you an email once your refund has been processed. After receiving this email, your refund should appear in your account within 5 business days. If you don't see your refund within 10 business days since you received our email, please contact our Customer Service team at 1 (844) 327-6891.

templates.name: Customer support
templates.content: The best way to handle this is to give us a call at 1 (844) 327-6891, Monday - Friday 8am-5pm, and Saturday, 10am-5pm (EST). Our team is happy to help!

templates.name: Phone support
templates.content: You can give us a call at 1 (844) 327-6891, or let me know if I can help via text, it may be faster.

templates.name: Rewards / referral
templates.content: We have a rewards program where you can earn points to redeem on future purchases. Check it out here - https://www.dermstore.com/account/redeem-points.list

templates.name: Cancel / edit order
templates.content:
To cancel or edit your order, please go to your account: https://www.dermstore.com/login.jsp?returnTo=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dermstore.com%2FaccountHome.account You can choose to cancel individual items or the whole order. We'll send you an email within an hour to let you know if the cancellation worked and a second email to let you know if the cancellation was processed. 

If your order is too far into the fulfillment process, I'm afraid we will not be able to cancel or edit your order. Items that are in stock are processed quickly so that we can aim to get products to our customers without delay.

templates.name: Social media
templates.content: Give us a follow on IG: https://www.instagram.com/dermstore and FB here: https://www.facebook.com/Dermstore/

templates.name: Free shipping
templates.content: We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $50. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

templates.name: Can I cancel or pause my subscription?
templates.content: For Auto-Replenishment, you can pause or cancel the subscription at anytime. Please go to your account to review your options: https://www.dermstore.com/login.jsp?returnTo=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.dermstore.com%2FaccountHome.account

templates.name: Store location / retailer
templates.content: We don't currently have a store but definitely keep an eye out!

templates.name: When will my loyalty points expire?
templates.content: Loyalty points expire 365 days after the date they were earned.

templates.name: How does Dermstore define 'Natural Preference'?
templates.content: 50% or more of the ingredients found in these products must be derived from a natural source, excluding water. These products cannot contain any of the ingredients from Dermstore's Potentially Harmful Ingredient List.

templates.name: Military / First responder / Healthcare / Teacher discount
templates.content: Thank you for your service! You can learn more and apply for your discount here: https://secure.gocertify.me/at/dermstore/essential-worker/essential-worker-15

templates.name: Can I place an order over the phone?
templates.content: I'm afraid all orders have to be placed through your online account but I'll be more than happy to help out.

templates.name: Order status/order tracking
templates.content: You can use our convenient online tool to see the latest updates on your order: https://www.dermstore.com/track-your-order.list

templates.name: Shipping time
templates.content: Our processing time takes 1-2 business days and once shipped it will take 3-5 business days for domestic orders.

templates.name: When will my Auto-Replenishment subscription be delivered?
templates.content: You will recieve an email that your Auto-Replenishment order is being prepared and the date of when it will be shipped.

templates.name: Return policy
templates.content: You can check out our detailed return policy here: https://www.dermstore.com/info/returns.list

templates.name: Brand ambassador / sponsorship / affiliate program
templates.content: Thank you for your interest! You can learn more and join our Affiliate program here: https://www.dermstore.com/info/affiliates.list

templates.name: What is an Auto-Replenish subscription?
templates.content: Auto-Replenishment is a simple way to set up repeat deliveries for your favorite beauty products at the frequency you select. You can set your subscription every 1,2,3 or 4 calendar months. Not all products on Dermstore participate in this subscription method, to see if a product does offer this service please see the product page. Some products may also offer a discount for subscribing.

templates.name: How do I start a return?
templates.content: You can start your return here: https://dermstore.returns.international/pro

templates.name: How to build a routine?
templates.content: You may want to check this link on how to start a routine: https://dermstore.attn.tv/aJ08w-_0oLXI I would also recommend checking out this blog on how to determine your skin type: https://dermstore.attn.tv/aNcoubkrJRSs Hope this helps. Let me know if you have any questions, I'm happy to help!

templates.name: Enjoy 15% off your First Order (Welcome Code) exclusions
templates.content: Please note that we maintain a list of products and brands excluded from Welcome or New Customer Promotions. You can take a look at all of the products that are excluded from our promotion codes here: https://www.dermstore.com/c/exclusions/new-customer

templates.name: Sales Page
templates.content: You can check out our sale & offers here: https://www.dermstore.com/c/sale/

templates.name: Payment Methods
templates.content: We offer a variety of online payment methods to ensure our customers can place orders with ease including: VISA, MasterCard, Maestro, American Express, Afterpay, Apple Pay, Google Pay, PayPal. You can select your preferred payment method at checkout. As we take fraud very seriously, you will face validation and authorization by us and the card issuer. We do this to ensure that our customers are safe while they shop!
